name: Sonic Error (Starring Zackary)
description:
Story:

You are Zack Playing One Of The Sonic Games On Chromebook. But Something Seems WRONG. After the Angel Island Bombing, It Comes Up With An Error That Says "Chrome OS Is Missing or Damaged" Then The Error Starts. It Gave You The Screen Of Death! You Restarted The Computer. But Then You Realized… They Interrupted Your Chromebook Session To Bring You Up a Sonic ERROR! What Would You Do?!

Information:

It Has 4 Alternate Lines

Zack’s Voice Acting! (PLS Respect.)

It Also Has 3 Endings!

Quick Time Events

Boss (Secret Ending).

Art Galleries And Bios On Code And It's Also a Secret Thing You Need To Find On During The Code.

WARNING!

This Game Contains:

Jumpscares,

Sudden Sounds,

Pop Ups,

Sudden Loud Noises,

Disturbing Contents.

Also I Want To Tell You, If You Are OBVIOUSLY Afraid Of Something That Scares You. DO NOT PLAY IT! Unless… You Like Horror Games, Do You???

Player Discretion Is ADVISED!

YOU HAVE BEEN WARNED.
